title: Can i be hacked?
body:
Can i be hacked if i write my summoner name (not the username) and the server i play in a website, and then confirm it?
BTW
How can i know if im hacked or not?

replies.body:
No, I can't imagine that would be enough information for someone to *hack* your account. If your account has been compromised, you'll usually notice transactions you didn't make in your history or matches in your match history that you never played, though there are other indicators too.

Let me know if you have any questions.

When i confirmed a small black screen with white words and number appeard (they ran fast on the black screen), then i closed the website, check the control panel and no new downloads appeard, computer works as usual, you think it was just a prank or something? maybe something did happen? i dont realy know.

If you're really worried, you can always go through the steps on [**this page**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) to make your account as secure as possible. It also wouldn't be a bad idea to change the password for the email associated with your account and enable 2-factor verification (authentication) if it's offered by your Email provider.

If you have any other concerns, please let me know. ^.^
